articles.title: Baseball bat kicked by San Francisco Giants pitcher Carlos Rodon hits teammate Thairo Estrada
articles.description: Giants pitcher Carlos Rodon kicked a bat in the dugout that hit shortstop Thairo Estrada in the knee on Tuesday.

articles.title: Las Vegas Aces defeat host Chicago Sky to win second annual WNBA Commissioner's Cup
articles.description: Chelsea Gray had 19 points, five assists and four rebounds in an MVP performance, and the Las Vegas Aces won the second annual WNBA Commissioner's Cup Championship Game on Tuesday night in Chicago, defeating the host Sky.
articles.content:

articles.description: It wasn't immediately clear how serious the injury is, but D-backs prospect Druw Jones would miss the rest of the season if it required surgery.
